parameters.name: ExpandType
parameters.description: Type of item to expand as defined in swBOMTableObjectType_e

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Row index; valid only if ExpandType is swBOMTableObjectType_e.swBOMTableObjectType_RowIndex

title: IBomTableAnnotation.Expand
signature:
void Expand( 
   System.Int32
ExpandType
,
   System.Int32
Index
)

parameters.name: ExpandType
parameters.description: Type of item to expand as defined in swBOMTableObjectType_e

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Row index; valid only if ExpandType is swBOMTableObjectType_e.swBOMTableObjectType_RowIndex

remarks: If ExpandType is swBOMTableObjectType_e.swBOMTableObjectType_CutList, then all cut lists in the table expand.
